tns:patch.author: vlimansky
tns:patch.description: Clean up incorrect 'Type of Implementation' paths

script.lang: delete from amp_modules_templates where module in (select id from amp_modules_visibility where name like '%Type of Implementation%' and name != '/Activity Form/Identification/Type of Implementation'); delete from amp_modules_visibility where name like '%Type of Implementation%' and name != '/Activity Form/Identification/Type of Implementation';
